text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Keep our gov’s name out of your mouth! You have no interest, understanding or concern for the state & people of NC. Gov Cooper asked you to follow state guidelines for covid-19 and you refused! Cooper cares about NC...you don’t #TraitorTrump #TrumpIsLosing
